# File lib/jabber4r/protocol.rb, line 827
827:       def reply
828:         message = Message.new(nil)
829:         message.to = @from
830:         message.id = @id
831:         message.thread = @thread
832:         message.type = @type
833:         message.session = @session
834:         @is_reply = true
835:         return message
836:       end
